name: Blanket Refresh
description: Give your blankets a new lease on life with our Blanket Refresh service. We wash, dry, and fold your blankets, ensuring a cozy and clean experience.

name: Bed Sheet Renewal
description: Indulge in the luxury of freshly laundered bed sheets. Our Bed Sheet Renewal service includes a thorough wash, dry, and meticulous folding for that perfect, hotel-quality finish.

name: Pillowcase Care
description: Rest your head on clean and crisp pillowcases. Our Pillowcase Care service ensures your pillowcases are thoroughly cleaned and presented with care.

name: Curtain Cleaning
description: Revitalize your space with our professional curtain cleaning service. We carefully clean and press your curtains, bringing freshness back to your home.

name: Towel Revive
description: Pamper yourself with our Towel Revive service. We wash and fluff your towels, leaving them soft, absorbent, and ready for your daily routine.

name: Tablecloth Service
description: Elevate your dining experience with our Tablecloth Service. We clean and press your tablecloths, ensuring a fresh and elegant look for your special occasions

name: Jacket and Coat Cleaning
description: Keep your outerwear in top condition. Our Jacket and Coat Cleaning service includes specialized care for different fabrics, leaving your garments looking sharp.

name: Baby Clothes Gentle Clean
description: Treat your little one's clothes with care. Our Baby Clothes Gentle Clean service uses baby-friendly detergents for sensitive skin.

name: Sports Gear Freshen Up
description: Maintain the performance and freshness of your sports gear. Our Sports Gear Freshen Up service includes cleaning and odor removal.

name: Pet Blanket Wash
description: Your furry friends deserve clean comfort too. Our Pet Blanket Wash service keeps their blankets fresh and cozy.

name: Kitchen and Household Essentials Package
description:
Keep your kitchen and household linens in top shape with our Kitchen and Household Essentials Package. From kitchen cloths to regular towels, we ensure everything stays fresh and clean.
Kitchen cloths, Regular towels ,Bed linens (sheets and pillowcases), Tablecloths

name: Patient Gown Care
description: Maintain a high standard of hygiene for patient gowns. Our Patient Gown Care service includes specialized cleaning to ensure a comfortable and sterile experience.

name: Scrub and Lab Coat Cleaning
description: Ensure cleanliness in medical settings. Our Scrub and Lab Coat Cleaning service provides specialized care for medical uniforms, meeting the highest hygiene standards.

name: Bed Linen Sterilization
description: For hospital-grade cleanliness, choose our Bed Linen Sterilization service. We employ advanced cleaning methods to ensure a sterile environment for patients.

name: Regular Usage Laundry Bundle
description:
Simplify your laundry routine with our Regular Usage Laundry Bundle. This all-in-one service includes washing, drying, and folding for everyday items like shirts, pants, and more. Shirts
Pants, T-shirts, Socks, Underwear, Casual wear.
